section.p: A blessing costs 20 Shards if you are an initiate, 40 Shards otherwise. You cannot buy a blessing from Molhern if you already have one.
Molhern’s blessing allows you a second attempt at any one failed MAGIC roll. After the second roll (whether successful or not) the blessing is used up.

p.if:
If you
buy a blessing
, write: MAGIC reroll (one use) in the Blessings box on your Adventure Sheet.
